channel.title: Ios on Khalid's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Ios on Khalid's Blog

item.title: 20 Shades of Smartwatch
item.description: Had enough with all smartwatch vendor these days, and it’s time to give my feedback base on 3 years experience using pebble watch. I’m going to share about what feature is really works or not, and if you are a smartwatch maker that just happens reading this blog I’m hoping this post will be a clue for your next flagship idea. It’s all more to smartwatch functionality, I don’t care whether it comes with a fancy strap, stainless/plastic body, or a screen made by gorilla, as long as it sturdy enough, it’s ok with me.
